metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43302 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Read out-of-bounds in PJSUA API when calling pjsua_recorder_create. Anattacker-controlled 'filename' argument may cause an out-of-bounds readwhen the filename is shorter than 4 characters.

criterions.comment: pjproject: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
